column4: Hi. Just upgraded to 9.04. The animation of virtual desktop changes feels more sluggish, like the frame rate dropped. Reconfiged xorg and checked settings. Didn't find anything. Anyone else?
What's your vid card and drive?
i810 card, where do I check the driver? Think its -intel
I've got a intel 945GM and I found out that there is a problem enabling tiling in the kernel. Will try UXA accel method and reboot. brb
